data: Donâ€™t use comments in this config files,you can configurate the movement of the dynamic image here
Dynamic image config file name (Don't modify the file name)
How many dynamic image file in the project?(How many dynamic images will collected in an event?)
How many dynamic image file at most show in the same time?
How often to check new dynamic images (second)
the time interval (second) between the first dynamic image and the second dynamic image
dynamic picture name display (default:1) no need to modified
Dynamic image animation type (default:1) no need to modified
Dynamic image movingspeed (How fast dynamic image move. unit:pixel per frame or *60 pixel per second)
